## Z scores
```{r}
x_vec = rnorm(25, mean = 5, sd = 4)

(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)
```


```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  return(z)
}
z_scores(x_vec)

y_vec = rnorm(40, mean = 12, sd = 0.3)
z_scores(y_vec)
```

How great is this?
only kind of great
Let's try again
```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Argument x should be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("X should have at least 3 numbers")
  }
  
  z = mean(x) / sd(x)
  
  z
}
```


```{r, error = TRUE}
z_scores(3)

z_scores(c("my", "name", "is", "jeff"))

z_scores(mtcars)
```



```{r}
mean_and_sd = function(x) {
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Argument x should be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("X should have at least 3 numbers")
  }
  
  mean_x = mean(x)
  sd_x = sd(x)

  output_df = 
    tibble(
    mean = mean_x, 
    sd = sd_x
  )
  return(output_df)
}

mean_and_sd(x_vec)
```
